data.title: PSB Alliance : Doortsep Banking
data.text:
Who is eligible for Doorstep Banking Services?

Doorstep banking services cater to all the individuals having full KYC-compliant savings account in any of the public sector bank with a valid mobile number registered with their Bank.

Why is the location not being fetched?

Please make sure you are using the latest version of the app and have granted location permissions to the application.

What is the reason to display "The selected Address is not within the Serviceable Range"?

Selected Address might be having No Branches with in the Radius or Agents won't be Available for Particular Area

Why isn't my branch showing up when I try to book a service?

When booking a service, only nearby branches within the serviceable area of your current location will be shown.

DSB Agent did not visit as per the time slot requested by me.

Reasons will be ascertained, and necessary action will be taken under intimation to the customer.

How can I identify a genuine DSB Agent at the time of service delivery?

Credentials of Agent along with Photo shall appear in the Mobile App/ Web Portal of Customer. Customer will get a SMS having name of Agent. Customer can demand ID Card showing Agent name and photo. Additionally a onetime Auth Code for each service will be sent to the customer which he need to tell Agent for initiating the service. Agents shall be follow uniform Dress code bearing DSB and Service Provider LOGO; for their eady identification.

How can I know that the DSB Agent has deposited the instruments with the Bank?

Once the Agent deposits the Instruments with the designated Bank Branch, DSB System will validate the Service Code of the customer and trigger a message "COMPLETED" which will be duly notified to the customer through Mobile App.

How DSB Agent will carry the Instruments?

Normally, you should handover the Instrument(s) along with the Pay-in-Slip in a sealed ENVELOP for operational convenience and security. You can write no of instrument, your Bank Branch name and your name on the face of the Envelop.

What are the Instruments/documents which I can give to DSB Agent for pickup?

You can deposit instruments viz. DD/ PO; New Cheque Book requisition slip; 15G / 15 H Form; Tax Challan; Standing Instruction request etc. For updated list of services please visit our website www.doorsteppsba.com/doorstep/customerlogin

Whether Bank will be intimated once I deposit Instruments to the DSB Agent?

Yes. Once the DSB Agent collects the instruments, he will Click "DOCUMENT COLLECTED" icon in his Device/Mobile App and all the Service Request placed will be automatically flow to the designated Bank Branch portal.

What is the process of registering any complaint or grievance?

Customers can raise a dispute/complaint over an on-going or completed service request. You have to initiate the dispute by selecting the option provided in the channel. You can also directly lodge complaint with the concerned Bank.

Can I register my complain against a completed Service Request?

Yes. You can register by selecting the option available in the Mobile App mentioning the Service Request ID/Code etc.

How do I follow up my complaint/dispute further?

Once you register Dispute/Complaint in the App, you will be allotted a Dispute ID. With this ID you can track the response.

Who will resolve my dispute?

Dispute Resolution will be done by Customer Care Executive of Service Provider/Bank as the case may be.

Can I lodge complaint with the Bank directly through email/Letter?

Yes. In any such communications, you have to mention the Service Request ID/Code for taking necessary further action.

How can I reach DSB customer support for any issues or inquiries?

Customer can call the call center number : +91 91522 20220

Can I use DSB portal or application on multiple devices at same time?

No.

Is the doorstep banking app available for iOS and Android?

Currently the app is available for Android devices only. You can download it from the play store. The app will be available for IOS users soon.

I am not able to change the mobile number in login page?

Please ensure that the mobile number you wish to input is available on the mobile device.

Why the message display as "Not registered yet" while log in?

Please ensure that you are using the same mobile number which is registered

In case of new user, need to register first then can login

What should I do when I receive the "Invalid credential" error message?

Please ensure that you are entering correct login pin.

Why I am getting the message says "Account is De-active" and what is the Solution?

This will happens once Customer Deactivated the Account and trying for login.Customer has to be Reactivate the Account.

Why am I not receiving the OTP (One-Time Password)?

Please make sure you have entered the correct mobile number to receive the OTP. If you are still unable to receive the OTP, kindly wait for some time and attempt the process again.

My OTP is validated successfully, but I'm not being redirected to the homepage. What should I do?

Close the DSB application and re open to try login again

Please ensure that your internet connectivity is stable.

Why do I receive the error message "User is locked. Please try after 5 minutes."?

If you attempt to log in with invalid credentials and fail three times consecutively, your account will be locked for security reasons. Please wait for a period of 5 minutes before attempting to log in again.

Why my account details are not being fetched?

Ensure that your registered mobile number is correctly linked to your respective account. If your registered mobile number is correctly linked and you are still experiencing issues, we recommend waiting for some time and then attempting to log in again.

When Error display as Internal server error from Bank?

Bank CBS system is slow or Some Technical issues on Server while fetching Response from Bank CBS.

When Error display as CBS Connection Error on OTP generation ?

Bank CBS system is not responding to Generate the OTP while placing Request Initiation or CBS is Having Issue.

What is the Reason throwing error as "Connection Error" while Service Booking confirmation time?

CBS connection Issue from Bank end, Server is not Connecting to the particular service.

What is the Reason Displays Error message says âKey is Mapped with Other Userâ

Since Application is Implemented with Sim Binding Concept , Mobile Number has to be Present in the Same Phone, User Should not try to login with Different device

While Requesting for OTP generation from bank displays error as âNo Eligible Accounts Available" whats the reason?

Customers Doesn't have the Accounts for particular Mobile Number.

What is the process of canceling the booked service in Application?

You can cancel a service if the agent has not yet started it. To initiate the cancellation process, please follow these steps:

Go to the 'Ongoing Service's page.

Select the specific service that you wish to cancel.

Below the service details, you will find a 'Cancel Service' button. Click on it.

Provide the relevant reason and click on cancel.

Once you complete these steps, the service will be canceled, and you will receive a cancellation confirmation message on your registered mobile number.

What should I do if I'm not available at the location during the scheduled appointment time?

In case of pickup service, You have the flexibility to reschedule your services based on your availability before the agent starts the service, similarly in delivery service you can reschedule before the bank user starts the service.

Whether Registration of my Mobile no with my Bank Account is a must to avail DSB Services?

Yes. You have to seed (link) your Mobile number with your Bank account.

Whether Mobile number seeding is a must for all my Bank Accounts?

All the accounts linked to your Customer ID are automatically seeded with your Mobile number.

I have multiple Accounts with multiple Banks. Can I avail DSB facility for all such Accounts?

You can avail DSB facility for any of the listed 12 PSU Banks against your Account linked with your Mobile number.

I have Joint Account with the Bank? Can I avail DSB facility?

The Customer of Joint Account having its Mobile number linked to the Account can avail the DSB facility provided the Account Operation mandate is "Either or Survivor"/"Any One or Survivor".

Whether I can save my Account in the Mobile App for future use?

Yes. There will be an option in the Mobile App to do so. This will help you save time to fetch the Account every time you log in.

Is there any Cancellation charges?

In the case of the Post service, order cancellation is done before the agent picks up the document from the customer.

In the case of Preservice, order cancellation is done before the bank user completes the request.

In all other circumstances on cancellation No Refund shall be done.

What is the Time available for completing a Service Request?

All request generated up to 3:00 P.M. should be completed within 3 hours of request generation and request generated after that should be completed by 1:00 pm next working day.

Can I cancel any active Service Request?

Yes. You can cancel any Service request even after initiation of the Request.

In which circumstances, I can not Cancel any Service Request?

In case of Post service, Request for cancellation of service is not possible after agent has picked up the document from customer. In case of Pre-Service, Request for cancellation of service is not possible after Bank User has completed the request.

How can I cancel my Service Request?

You need to visit Order details screen ( for live order tracking in landing page).

Can I cancel my Service request directly contacting the Bank?

No. You need to place Cancel Order through Mobile App/ DSB Channel or Call Center only.
